welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chalmette, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture! We invite you to soak in the sights, flavors, and experiences of our beautiful city and make unforgettable memories here. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lakefront Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lakefront Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport is used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport is used for domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines, Southwest Airlines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Louis Armstrong New Orléans International Airport is used for international flights operated by Air Canada, Air France, British Airways, and more.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
